title: Barack Obama on "A Promised Land," Nurturing Future Leaders and Black Lives Matter
itunes:title: Barack Obama on "A Promised Land," Nurturing Future Leaders and Black Lives Matter
description:
Barack Obama talks about his memoir "A Promised Land," discusses his many leadership programs worldwide and gives his take on the Black Lives Matter movement. Originally aired December 2020.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
